_header: Jesu that would for us die / and was born of maid Mary

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Iesu þat wold for vs dye& was boren of mayde
                    marieȝeue hem alle his blessingþat wole here þis
                    talking…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Amen amen par chariteif þat his blessed wille
                    beo
BodLauMis463.Note:
Two columns per page, one in which two lines of text are written on a
                    single line in the column, the other in which a single line of text takes a line
                    in the column.
BodLauMis463.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “With an O and an I.” 
             Anglia
         27 (1904): 283-319: 185.
